content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10562,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/909948cb-6e71-45f1-9eb1-3985c826cf0d/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/909948cb-6e71-45f1-9eb1-3985c826cf0d/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"compensation.png\",\"name\":\"compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"909948cb-6e71-45f1-9eb1-3985c826cf0d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1023,\"height\":90},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your salary is paid monthly in the last working week of each month. The company will deduct Social Security and Income Tax from your monthly pay.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your salary will be reviewed annually and may be changed from time to time at the company’s discretion without affecting the other terms of your employment. There is no obligation to award an increase. There will be no review of the salary after notice has been given by either party to terminate the employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find more information at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://policy.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"policy.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" > Compensation and Benefits.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please use the widget “Compensation package” in your Telescope profile to view the details of your compensation.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any questions or issues, drop an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfaanywheresalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please note that the answer might require five business days.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
